screenshots.description: Payroll menu expanded showing Air tickets section with Employee air tickets and My air tickets options
Air ticket requests main page showing tabs (Pending, Approved, Processed, Rejected), search, filters, and download options
Employee profile showing Air tickets tab with policy status, remaining requests counter, and request history
Air ticket balance display showing 'Remaining air ticket requests: -' with clear text and action buttons (Reject/Accept)
Confirmation modal for accepting air ticket encashment request showing amount and employee details
Role management page showing employee role assignments including Expense Manager role
Custom roles configuration page in role management settings
